title: Sowing A Seed In Your Time of Need | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Sowing A Seed In Your Time of Need | Joel Osteen
description:
The best thing we can do in our time of need is sow a seed for someone else. When you focus on giving to others, God will make sure you get everything you need. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
